enhanced_by.reason: Setting the description is necessary to ensure the toString method includes the correct description in its output.
Setting the 'since' version is necessary to ensure the toString method includes the correct version information in its output.
Setting the 'forRemoval' flag is necessary to ensure the toString method includes the correct removal status in its output.
The toString method includes the description, so assertions can be informed by the getDescription method.
The toString method includes the 'since' version, so assertions can be informed by the getSince method.
The toString method includes the 'forRemoval' status, so assertions can be informed by the isForRemoval method.
